name: Polyglot
0:
”Alexa, launch polyglot class”
”Alexa, ask polyglot class for the next task”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: polyglot class
des:
Polyglot is used to measure a student's skills in the subjects taught in his or her school/university classroom. Teachers define activities and quizzes that are provided for students to learn at home. When these activities are available, they are offered and each student has the freedom to review the topics from home by taking simple quizzes or listening to learning resources/material provided by teachers.

Note: This version is for demo purpose
